data.text: @SenatorWicker @hrkbenowen This, the last administration brought on. Maybe we should continue deportation and increase staff on the immigration and naturalization department to be able to process request to come into the US faster…ELON Musk could help with technology to make it happen.  ❤️immigration.✝️☮️
@SenatorWicker @hrkbenowen Of course you do you need the votes
@SenatorWicker Job creation in Byhalia? C'mon man!

@SenatorWicker I expect you to SUPPORT ICE and do whatever they need to do to protect us and enforce laws. I also expect you to PUSH for the SAVE ACT. 
Regardless of what you people in Washington think we are all aware of what you do and don’t do. And we share that with our friends and family.
@babysarge75 @SenatorWicker He's been screaming it for years.

@HighPlainsFella @SenatorWicker That's right. For that matter let's end the practice of arrest all together. For that matter, let's end 911 even being able to contact the police. Freedom For Everyone. 

Fool.

@SenatorWicker As a Mississippian who has watched my Rep controlled state turn away to years of illegals in the workforce, especially the poultry industry and let's not forget Howard Industries, I'm glad to see Trump sending the message because none of you have.
@SenatorWicker I agree. Ship them home ASAP
@SenatorWicker @ScarboroughNow It’s all good until it’s in your back yard. You need to own it Senator.
